content: scroll way down the page for the pattern instructions this easy continuous granny square blanket crochet pattern will show you how to make an infinity granny square blanket with a border it s a really fun and simple crochet blanket pattern that works up really quickly and looks stunning when complete the pattern has step-by-step written instructions as well as a video tutorial about this granny square crochet blanket - this is a very easy crochet blanket pattern and it includes a full video tutorial - you can use any size 3 light or size 4 medium yarn all the yarn details are included in the pattern - you can make it as a crochet baby blanket stroller or carseat blanket throw or really any kind of blanket - once you complete the first few rounds the pattern repeats the same round over and over making it the perfect mindless and relaxing crochet project - it s a classic granny square blanket pattern that s always in style - the shell blanket border compliments the blanket for a lovely finish - the blanket is reversible and looks beautiful on either side
